page.title: 18KENILWORTH CASTLE (CONT)
page.content: INTERVIEW WITH CUSTODIAN WAGES DEPEND ON HOURS WORKED EACH WEEK.THE DAYS THEY WORK VARY WITH THE TIME OF YEAR.THEY ENJOY BEING OUT IN THE FRESH AIR AND BEING THEIR OWN BOSS. ENTRANCE TO THE CASTLE AT THE BRAYS. THE CAR PARK AT THIS ENTRANCE HOLDS ABOUT 47 CARS AND THERE IS A GRASSED AREA FOR PICNICS OR AN OVERFLOW OF CARS. ENTRANCE TO THE CASTLE AT CASTLE GREEN THIS IS A MUCH SMALLER CAR PARK WITH NO ROOM FOR AN OVERFLOW BUT THERE ARE AREAS OF GRASS ON THE GREEN SUITABLE FOR PICNICS. VISITORS TO THE CASTLE ARE FROM MANY DIFFERENT NATIONALITIES.MOST VISITORS COME TO THE CASTLE ON SATURDAYS AND SUNDAYS AND LEAST COME ON MONDAYS.MOST OF THE VISITORS ENJOY THEIR TIME AT THE CASTLE ESPECIALLY IN GOOD WEATHER.
